Question: PortaPower (China) Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
PortaPower (China) Limited

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Manufacturer of high-quality rechargeable batteries and related products
- Offers over 3,000 different models of replacement battery and charger
- Specializes in manufacturing OEM items according to customer specifications
- Utilizes lithium-ion cells from reputable manufacturers in Japan, Korea, and China
- Leading products include battery packs for laptop computers, power tools, eBikes, camcorders, and digital cameras
- Highly efficient production and assembly workforce with modern equipment
- ISO 9001 certified factory with a production capacity of over 1,000,000 units per month
- Invests heavily in research and development to stay at the forefront of battery technology
- Headquarters in Hong Kong with offices, laboratories, and factories in Hong Kong and China
